objects.main¶

objects.main.Entity¶

class objects.main.Entity.Entity(level: Level, groups: tuple, animations_path: str, sounds: dict[str, set[str]], position: ~pygame.math.Vector2, abs_accel: int, max_speed: int, health: int, max_health=None, energy=None, max_energy=None, look_angle: ~pygame.math.Vector2 = <Vector2(1, 0)>)[source]¶

Bases: Sprite

Base entity class.

animate()[source]¶

Animate entity walk.

collision(direction)[source]¶

Check if entity collides with obstacles.

Parameters:

direction – direction of collide, can be vertical or horizontal

get_hit(damage: int)[source]¶

Get hit if entity was attacked.

Parameters:

damage – hit damage

move(sprint=False)[source]¶

Change entity position.

Parameters:

sprint – move faster flag

set_animation_state()[source]¶

Animation state: down, up, left or right.

sprint_off()[source]¶

Stop sprint.

sprint_on()[source]¶

Start sprint.
